sources.name: World Bank WDI (Trade as share of GDP)
sources.description:
e.g. Source 1
Data provider World Bank
Source World Development Indicators
Description
The sum of exports and imports of goods and services measured as a share of gross domestic product.
Linkhttp://data.worldbank.org/indicator/NE.TRD.GNFS.ZS
Retrieved5 January 2016

Additional information

The World Bank is using data from the World Bank national accounts data, and OECD National Accounts data files.

variables.name: World Bank WDI (Trade as share of GDP)
variables.coverage: Global by country and by world region
